meanings.definition: A sharp projection or ridge, as on a leaf or stem.
meanings.sent1: The aristas on the leaf made it look spiky.
meanings.sent2: Be careful of the aristas on the stem, they can be sharp.
meanings.sent3: The aristas on the leaf were so pointy, they could poke you!
meanings.sent4: The aristas on the stem stood out like tiny spears.
meanings.sent5: The aristas on the leaf gleamed in the sunlight, like tiny blades.

meanings.definition: The bristle-like hairs on the ears of some animals.
meanings.sent1: The cat's aristas twitched as it listened intently.
meanings.sent2: The dog's aristas perked up when it heard a noise.
meanings.sent3: The bunny's aristas wiggled comically when it was curious.
meanings.sent4: The fox's aristas seemed to sense danger in the air.
meanings.sent5: The bear's aristas were so fluffy, they looked like little brushes.

meanings.sent1: The aristas of ice sparkled in the sunlight.
meanings.sent2: The aristas of salt formed delicate crystals.
meanings.sent3: The aristas of sugar looked like tiny diamonds under the microscope.
meanings.sent4: The aristas of quartz shimmered like miniature needles.
meanings.sent5: The aristas of snow glistened like tiny icicles in the winter sun.
